title: Mr Boukadoum takes part in the consultative meeting of Arab foreign ministers
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, took part in Doha on Tuesday in the consultative meeting of Arab foreign ministers and in the meeting of the Arab Ministerial Council to act and put an end to the shameless measures taken against Palestinians in occupied Al Quds. Mr Boukadoum also participated in the extraordinary session of the Council of the League of Arab States, with a view to examining developments in the affair of the " renaissance dam " in Ethiopia.
